comments:
I was selecting and double-clicking on graph nodes and I got several of the following exceptions logged.  I could not figure out a pattern.

Using the keyword [pde viz] for all plugin dependency visualization bugs.
This happens when you select an edge (instead of a node).  I have fixed this by checking if an edge is selecting and simply returning if it is.
